description: This middle eastern inspired grilled romaine salad with spiced crispy chickpeas and tahini dressing is a perfect summer lunch or light dinner option.
keywords: Vegetable dishes,Low saturated fat,High fibre,High protein,Low salt,Christmas,Low sugar,Summer
name: Grilled Romaine Lettuce with Crispy Chickpeas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 heads romaine lettuce, sliced into quarters

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Toss the chickpeas in a tablespoon of oil in a roasting tin, sprinkle with garam masala and toss to coat. Roast for 20 minutes, shaking halfway through.
Brush the romaine wedges with olive oil all over. Heat a large griddle pan on the highest heat and sear the wedges for 1 minute on each side until lightly charred, working in batches.

Whisk the yoghurt, tahini, garlic and lemon juice together to make a dressing, adding water to loosen if necessary. Arrange the wedges on a serving platter, drizzle with dressing, top with crispy chickpeas and pomegranate seeds and serve.
